Text saved: **Marine protected areas** are places in the sea. People protect the animals and plants there. **Overfishing** is when people catch too many fish.

Lewis wants more marine protected areas.
Now, 3 out of 100 sea areas are protected.
Lewis wants 10 out of 100 areas to be protected.
He wants to stop the bad things people do.
People do things like overfishing.
They also make the sea dirty.
They throw rubbish in the sea.

Lewis went on trips.
He saw this big damage to nature.
He swam over coral reefs.
The water was too hot.
The reefs became white.
He saw places under the Red Sea.
These places were like deserts.
There was no life there.
There was a lot of plastic.

Pugh thinks nature can get better.
It needs space to do this.
But there is not much time.
We must help our seas now.
If not, we will have a big problem.
We cannot fix this problem.
